title: Introduction
lead: UI8Kit is a design system that combines React development with semantic HTML5/CSS3 output. Build interactive apps during development, generate production-ready templates for multiple engines.

sections.title: Design system
sections.text: Components, variants, and tokens. All styled via semantic props — no raw Tailwind. Shadcn-style theming with CSS variables.

sections.title: Semantic HTML5
sections.text: Valid W3C output. Proper landmarks (header, main, nav, section, article). Accessible and SEO-friendly.

sections.title: Multi-engine
sections.text: One source — React DSL. Generate to React, Liquid, Handlebars, Twig, Latte. Ready for CDN and MCP registry.
